name: Space Aim - The Survival
description:
This is a space adventure/arcade game. Face daring enemies, while venturing deep into space. 

Progress through enemy waves, defeat Mid Boss and Final Boss.

Mission: KILL ALL AND SURVIVE!!!

Tips -

* Healths are dropped when enemies die and while you are fighting Mid Boss or Boss, don't collect if you don't need it. The health never disappears so stack health for when you need it  ; )
